articles.title: How the fentanyl crisis' fourth wave has hit every corner of the US - BBC

articles.content:

articles.title: Universe slows cosmic growth defying the theory of relativity - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Contrary to earlier understandings based on Einstein's theory of general relativity, new research has now found that the pace of growth of large cosmic structures is slower than expected.
articles.content: The researchers claim that growth suppression is supported by both the Planck data on the cosmic microwave background and the data on the large-scale structure of galaxies, clusters of galaxies, and … [+1729 chars]
